content: Hi all, I wanted to introduce myself. My name is Mary, and Iâ€™m a PhD student at CU Boulder in Mechanical Engineering. I am currently working on model reduction of coupled bgc-physical models and am interested in implementing these techniques to MARBL + MOM6. I want to thank you all for having such a welcoming environment. Please let me know if you have any questions. I look forward to getting to know you all, and I hope you all have a wonderful weekend!
Welcome @Mary McGuinn! Look forward to working with you!
